name: PannerNode
description: The PannerNode interface represents the position and behavior of an audio source signal in space. It is an AudioNode audio-processing module describing its position with right-hand Cartesian coordinates, its movement using a velocity vector and its directionality using a directionality cone.

refs.name: Web Audio API
refs.description: The definition of 'PannerNode' in the 'Web Audio API' specification.
